rows.label: tlk006501_02_msg0001
rows.name: I still can't say I really trust those brats.

rows.label: tlk006501_02_msg0002
rows.name:
They look like they're working hard,
but you never know when they might
up and off with something again...

rows.label: tlk006501_02_msg0003
rows.name:
I don't care how tragic it is that they
lost their homes. You can't just resort
to stealing!

rows.label: tlk006501_02_msg0004
rows.name:
No, there's no telling what they might
do. I've still got my eye on them...
